operating_fees.info: After agreement with aerodrome operator depending on the nature of the intended activity.

operating_fees.amount: Hangar rate per day 200,00 Apron free of charge per day, charge for long term parking according to an agreement with the aerodrome operator.

operating_fees.info: The charge for dispatch of international flight is subject of a settlement with the aerodrome operator.

other_information: Providing information to known traffic, considering the meteorological situation and further traffic conditions it is necessary to favour the direct approaches and direct departures of ACFT without needless circling flights.
